ygData.msgSnippet: Only 2 songs use mana, I wouldn t sweat it. Kit ... From: Stacey [mailto:selene1212@yahoo.com] Sent: Thursday, July 26, 2001 1:22 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Only 2 songs use mana, I wouldn't sweat it.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Stacey [mailto:selene1212@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 26, 2001 1:22 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Bard Mana???


--- "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
<garramone@...> wrote:
> It matters if you charm a lot (very lot) since
> bard mana is based on
> INT. AGI affects defensive combat skill
> increases, DEX affects
> offensive combat skill increases.
>
> Shada/Erisi


Since when do Bards use mana? And does this mean
I need to worry about INT now since everyone has
told me all I need to worry about is STR/CHA/AGI?
Also, I thought the charm songs were directly
affected by charisma and not intelligence...
What's the deal? Please clarify... PS Will mana
items help me?
